data.eml:eml: Further records of burrow-associated palaemonid shrimps (Decapoda: Palaemonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anker, Arthur, Grave, Sammy De (2019): Further records of burrow-associated palaemonid shrimps (Decapoda: Palaemonidae). Zootaxa 4612 (1): 145-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4612.1.13
